title: City Gatehouse
description: Thick stone walls and a low arched ceiling define this utilitarian gatehouse chamber. Slots in the ceiling reveal the raised portcullis above, and racks of spare crossbows and quarrels line the walls. A pair of benches sit near a brazier where guards warm themselves between patrols. A narrow staircase spirals upward into the wall tower, though it's barred to civilians. The only exit is south, back to Sagewind Avenue.

south.description: The stone corridor opens south to the end of Sagewind Avenue.

extra_descriptions.description: A heavy iron portcullis is set into the ceiling above the entrance, currently held aloft by thick chains and a pulley system.
A cast-iron brazier glows faintly with coal embers, keeping the chamber warm for the gate guards.
A narrow spiral staircase leads upward into the tower above, but a locked iron gate blocks further passage.
